Uses of Interface
ch.linetic.camera.CameraInterface

  • Packages that use CameraInterface 
    Package Description
    ch.linetic.camera  

    • Uses of CameraInterface in ch.linetic.camera

      Classes in ch.linetic.camera that implement CameraInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Kinect
      Implementation of the CameraInterface using the Kinect by Microsoft
      class  KinectSimulator
      Implementation of the CameraInterface by simulating a kinect
      Methods in ch.linetic.camera that return CameraInterface 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CameraInterface Kinect.getNextKinect(processing.core.PApplet parrent)
      Return the next kinect camera available If there is only one kinect connected, it returns that kinect the first time we call that function but throws a NoCameraConnectedException if we call it again
